text: mūsā taṉ makkaḷai nōkkik kūṟiya camayattil ‘‘allāh uṅkaḷukkup purintirukkum aruḷai niṉaittup pāruṅkaḷ: Avaṉ uṅkaḷai ḥpir'avṉuṭaiya kūṭṭattāriṭamiruntu kāppāṟṟiṉāṉ. Avarkaḷō uṅkaḷukkuk koṭiya nōviṉai ceytukoṇṭu vantatuṭaṉ, uṅkaḷ āṇpiḷḷaiyai vatai ceytu peṇ piḷḷaiyai (maṭṭum) uyiruṭaṉ vāḻa viṭṭuk koṇṭumiruntārkaḷ. Itil uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉāl uṅkaḷukkup perum cōtaṉai ēṟpaṭṭiruntatu'' (eṉṟu kūṟiṉār)
